title: Journey (Sen)
brief_description: A young boy leaves his isolated home town hitching across a forever changing landscape. His travels cause him to relive fragments of the life left behind as he struggles to find rest in a journey that may never end. An award winning short from Indigenous filmmaker Ivan Sen whose other films include Tears, Wind and Dust.
